Description: Logical path template key used by apps/daemons
Category/type of path (used for grouping and automation)
Notes: If you want v1 free text, drop FK and keep as path_type text.

Description: Anchor base for resolving relpath (dropbox_root vs project_root)
Relative path segment from the anchor (no absolute paths, no '..', no backslashes)
Notes: Constraint shown is a practical regex check; you can harden it further if needed.

Description: Whether this path must exist (daemon should verify/provision)
Whether automation/users should be able to write into this path
Optional description of the path key intent
Example: Primary delivery folder for exports sent to client.

Description: Whether this template is currently active/used
